entry.title: OP_CHECKSPVPROOFVERIFY
entry.summary: In a discussion thread, Eric Lombrozo is seeking clarification on the use of OP_CAT. He suggests that it can be used to open-code a merkle tree calculation along with OP_HASH256, without requiring a new OP, which may be more efficient. However, he also notes that this discussion may not be specific to lightning technology. Rusty agrees that they may be getting off-topic for the list and bids farewell.
